data.name: Relaxing Moroccan BOHO 3bdrm in Midtown

address.display: Apt 1, 4037 Warwick Boulevard, Kansas City, MO, 64111, US

data.summary:
Large space - Fantastic location! Walking distance to many KC amenities:
* 4 blocks to Nelson-Atkins, Kemper & Art Institute (& the beautiful campus)
* 10 min walk to Westport
* 3 min drive to the Plaza
* 10 min drive to Downtown, Sprint Center & Convention Center
* 2 blocks from Starbucks
* 3 blocks from The Roasterie & Quick Trip Gas station

No LOCALS without GREAT reviews allowed.
data.description:
Large space - Fantastic location! Walking distance to many KC amenities:
* 4 blocks to Nelson-Atkins, Kemper & Art Institute (& the beautiful campus)
* 10 min walk to Westport
* 3 min drive to the Plaza
* 10 min drive to Downtown, Sprint Center & Convention Center
* 2 blocks from Starbucks
* 3 blocks from The Roasterie & Quick Trip Gas station

No LOCALS without GREAT reviews allowed.

This Relaxing Moroccan Boho Apartment was inspired by my trip to Morocco a few years back.  Love the bright colors & intricate patterns used & attempted to recreate here.  This first floor apartment is well laid out with a great open space to mingle between the Living & Dining Rooms.  A full service kitchen with newer appliances are available as well as laundry.  Feel free to relax in the rocker on the front porch - sip an evening cocktail with friends before heading out for a night in KC!  You have access to a back porch as well.

One of my favorite things about Kansas City are its old glorious buildings - which is why I fell in love with this 1900 Victorian charmer.  This home has seen a lot in it's 100+ years, including being converted into 4 separate apartments

Coffee (& sugar & creamer) is provided, or take a short walk to Starbucks just 2 blocks away - or our local favorite, the Roasterie.  Log in to your personal TV apps on the Roku TV.  G. Fiber is the fastest internet in town.

For ideas on restaurants, night life & KC attractions while you're in town, check out my GUIDEBOOK online - a printed copy is also available in the home.

Looking forward to seeing you soon!
Jaymi

Keyless entry using a code for the lock on the front door.  Will be provided a day or two before your arrival.

I am a pretty hands off host, knowing you've come to KC to visit with other folks & not me :)  Always available for questions & area suggestions!

Southmoreland is such a great neighborhood.  So close to so many things - the Art Institute, the Plaza, Westport, Downtown, a Starbucks 2 blocks away, the Nelson Atkins Museum.  It's even worth walking the neighborhood to see all the beautiful old homes!

Westport also has some shops, restaurants & antique stores.

Uber is super easy and can wisk you home after a night on the town. Buses run regularly down Main St which is 2 blocks away.  They can get you anywhere!  Also soon to be a stop on the new streetcar line connecting Downtown to the Plaza!  It's currently running from Downtown to the River Market - a great (& free!) way to explore some of Kansas City.  Park/Uber to Union Station - and hop on the streetcar there! (free wifi)

Uber is approx $30 and 30min from the airport.

There is plenty of off-street parking in the side lot - able to accommodate a moving van and more than one car if you have it. Looking forward to your stay!  Welcome & enjoy.

PETS:
Cats & Dogs that don't bark are welcome. I must be respectful of the neighbors so cannot have barkers. There is a one-time pet fee of $25.

data.summary:
Escape to this spacious 12-bed duplex in StoneBridge Resort - perfect for family reunions, corporate retreats & group vacations! 

Your Large Group (sleeps 40) will love being together while having plenty of room to spread out with 2 Living Rooms - 2 Rec rooms - 2 Screened-in Porches - 2 Open Patios & a Private Game Room!

▪ 5min to Silver Dollar City
▪ Walk to pool #1 - one of 3 pools in the resort (MemDay-LaborDay)
▪ GOLF on site (fees apply)
▪ Pickleball, Tennis, V-Ball, B-Ball
▪ Great views!
data.description:
Escape to this spacious 12-bed duplex in StoneBridge Resort - perfect for family reunions, corporate retreats & group vacations! 

Your Large Group (sleeps 40) will love being together while having plenty of room to spread out with 2 Living Rooms - 2 Rec rooms - 2 Screened-in Porches - 2 Open Patios & a Private Game Room!

▪ 5min to Silver Dollar City
▪ Walk to pool #1 - one of 3 pools in the resort (MemDay-LaborDay)
▪ GOLF on site (fees apply)
▪ Pickleball, Tennis, V-Ball, B-Ball
▪ Great views!

Welcome to your ideal retreat for large gatherings! Our expansive duplex at 11 Bogey Lane, Branson West, MO, offers unparalleled accommodations and amenities, making it perfect for family reunions, corporate retreats, and group vacations.

Property Highlights:
	• Spacious Accommodations: Each side of the duplex features 6 bedrooms, comfortably sleeping up to 20 guests per side. Rent both units together to host up to 40 guests, ensuring ample space for everyone.
	• Entertainment Galore: Enjoy two living rooms, two recreation rooms, two screened-in porches, and two open patios. The game room (NEW 2025!) & rec rooms are equipped with a POOL TABLE, 2 SHUFFLEBOARDS, AIR HOCKEY, ARCADE & PINBALL games, Retro ATARI games, SKEEBALL, TODDLER PLAY AREA, board games, CORN HOLE and more, providing endless fun for all ages!

Resort Amenities: 
Located within the prestigious & gated StoneBridge Resort, guests have access to:
		○ Swimming Pools: Three large community pools, with one just a 2-minute walk away (open Memorial Day through Labor Day).
		○ Golf: On-site at the Ledgestone Championship Golf Course, renowned as one of the best public courses in Branson (fees apply).
		○ Sports Facilities: Pickleball, Tennis, Sand Volleyball, Basketball courts, 3 Playgrounds & a Fitness Center. Equipment rental available.
		○ Fishing: Catch & Release Fishing at Fox Lake - in the resort - just a 5 min drive.  Rent poles from the Welcome Center.
		○ Dining: An on-site restaurant at the Country Club offers tasty & affordable meals with scenic views - just a 5 min drive.
 
Prime Location: 
		○ Just a 5-minute drive to Silver Dollar City, a premier 1880s-themed amusement park featuring thrilling rides, live shows, and festivals. 
		○ The property backs onto Ledgestone Championship Golf Course (fees apply)
		○ Near Table Rock Lake, offering a plethora of water activities including swimming & boating.  
		○ Stonebridge is a quiet escape -  just 15 minutes from the Strip where you can visit fantastic museums and attractions for the whole family, as well as live music shows, magic shows & shopping.

Nearby Attractions and Activities:
	• Table Rock Lake: Engage in boating, fishing, swimming, and water sports. The lake is known for its clear waters and is a haven for anglers and water enthusiasts. 
	• Lake Taneycomo: Famous for trout fishing, this lake also offers kayaking and scenic boat tours. 
	• Branson Jet Boats: Experience an exhilarating boat ride on Lake Taneycomo, combining high-speed maneuvers with sightseeing. 
	• Moonshine Beach: A sandy shoreline on Table Rock Lake, perfect for swimming, picnicking, and relaxation. 

Upcoming Festivals and Events:
Branson hosts numerous events throughout the year. Here are some highlights:
	• Spring Exposition (April 10 - May 12, 2025): A brand-new festival at Silver Dollar City featuring new shows, flavors, and attractions. 
	• Bluegrass & BBQ (May 14 - 26, 2025): Enjoy performances by top bluegrass artists and savor mouthwatering barbecue at Silver Dollar City. 
	• Branson Elvis Festival (May 2 - 4, 2025): Celebrate the King of Rock 'n' Roll with tribute artists and special events at the Pepsi Legends Theater. 
	• Southern Gospel Picnic (August 21 - September 1, 2025): A gathering of renowned Southern gospel artists combined with delicious southern-style cuisine. 
	• Harvest Festival (September 12 - October 26, 2025): Featuring thousands of illuminated pumpkins, crafts, and live entertainment at Silver Dollar City. 

Parking and Accessibility:
	• Parking: The property accommodates up to 6 cars, with additional overflow parking available nearby.
	• Resort Fee: A $5 per vehicle per night fee is collected by StoneBridge Resort at check-in.
	• Note: The resort does not permit bus, boat, RV, jet ski, or trailer parking. Please consult local marinas for alternative parking options.

Where you'll Sleep:
9 Bogey (Cowboy side w/pool table): 
UPSTAIRS: 
	• BDRM 1: 1 King bed w/en suite master bathroom 
	• BDRM 2: 1 Queen 
	• BDRM 3: 1 King 
	• Living Room: 1 Queen Sofa Bed

DOWNSTAIRS: 
	• BDRM 4: 2 Queen Beds 
	• BDRM 5: 1 King; bunk beds: Twin over Queen 
	• BDRM 6: 'bonus' room through Bdrm5: 2 twin beds 
	• Living Room: 1 Queen Sofa Bed

11 Bogey (Americana side w/toddler play area): 
UPSTAIRS: 
	• BDRM 1: 1 King bed w/en suite master bathroom 
	• BDRM 2: 1 Queen 
	• BDRM 3: 1 Queen 
	• Living Room: 1 Queen Sofa Bed

DOWNSTAIRS: 
	• BDRM 4: 2 Queen Beds 
	• BDRM 5: 2 Queen Beds 
	• BDRM 6: 'bonus' room through Bdrm5: 1 Queen 
	• Living Room: 1 Queen Sofa Bed

Whether you're planning a family reunion, a corporate retreat, or a group vacation, our property at 9 & 11 Bogey Lane offers the perfect blend of comfort, entertainment, and proximity to Branson's top attractions. Book your stay today and create unforgettable memories!

You have access to RESORT AMENITITES with your included amenity pass:
▪  3 on-site pools (MemDay-LaborDay)
▪  3 Pickleball & Tennis courts 
▪  3 Playgrounds 
▪  Fitness Center 
▪  Basketball Court 
▪  Sand Volleyball Court
▪  Catch & Release Fishing
▪  Paved Walking Path around the Lake
▪  Clubhouse Restaurant - affordable - great patio!
▪  Golf at Ledgestone - greens fees not included

Reach out anytime!  Feel free to message me through the AirBnB app should you have any questions - please let me know if anything needs attention.  Happy to help where I can & ensure you & your group have a 5 star vacation getaway!

RESORT FEE:  StoneBridge Resort will collect a $5 per vehicle per night fee.  The resort will collect this payment from you AT CHECKIN.

The Resort does not allow Bus, Boat, RV, Jet Ski or Trailer parking.  Please check with the local marina for options.

Onsite Parking for 6-7 cars.  Overflow parking available 1 block away. Street parking is not allowed.

Grill:  If you use the grill, please clean afterwards as cleaners do not tend to the grill.
Showers:  pull DOWN on tub faucet lip to engage the shower - it's weird :)
Popcorn machine:  Add all ingredients at once as the machine gets hot quickly

details.additional_rules:
- Should you use the grill, please clean the grill with the scraper after use so it is ready for the next guest.  This isn't included in the cleaning fee.
- Please keep noise to a minimum after 10pm and before 7:00am.  Please be respectful of the neighbors.
- No smoking inside the home.  Smoking inside (including the upper patio) will result in a $200 fine.
- No parties or events unless previously approved by the host in writing.  At no time should there be more than 40 people in the home (20 on either side).
- Late check-out is not an option due to a contract with the cleaning agency.  Early check-in may be an option... text Jaymi the day of to see if the space is ready.
- Unfortunately the resort may impose extra fees:
          * $50 if the Grill is not cleaned & ready for the next guests use
          * $100 for each parking or excessive noise offense
          * $200 if the Police are called to the home.  If Police come to the home a second time, a second $200 fee will be charged and you will need to leave the premises with no refund for your stay.

data.description:
Very cozy & homey apartment- Fantastic location! Walking distance to many KC amenities:
- 4 blocks to Nelson-Atkins, Kemper & Art Institute (& the beautiful campus)
- 10 min walk to Westport
- 3 min drive to the Plaza
- 10 min drive to Downtown, Sprint Center & Convention Center
- 2 blocks from Starbucks
- 2 blocks from the Roasterie

NO LOCALS without GREAT reviews allowed

NOTE:  Dining Chairs have been switched out - updated photos coming.

One of my favorite things about Kansas City are its old glorious buildings - which is why I fell in love with this 1900 Victorian charmer.  This home has seen a lot in it's 100+ years, including being converted into 4 separate apartments.  Your Cozy Midcentury 2 bedroom is on the 3rd floor.  Once you enter the space, you get to smile and settle in - you're in your home away from home.  Welcome & relax.

I've scoured every antique store in the state to create an authentic mid-century space - focused on peace & comfort.  Enjoy high end bedding & towels.  You'll find a fully equipped kitchen to meet your cooking & entertaining needs.  Coffee (& sugar & creamer) is provided, or take a short walk to Starbucks just 2 blocks away, or our local favorite - the Roasterie.  Cable is provided, including access to 100's of channels & movies (just leave cash if you download a movie to rent).  There are also DVDs & board games under the tv for your entertainment.  G. Fiber Internet available - the fastest in town. 

If you're here for work - there's a desk in the second bedroom for your use - right under the skylight so you can brainstorm with the clouds :)

For ideas on restaurants, night life & KC attractions while you're in town, check out my GUIDEBOOK online - a printed copy is also available in the home.

You access this space through the side door.  When facing the home, follow the sidewalk around to the left.  You will see the red door on the North side of the building.  Unit 3 is located at the TOP of the stairwell.

I am a pretty hands off host, knowing you've come to KC to visit with other folks & not me :)  Always available for questions & area suggestions!

Southmoreland is such a great neighborhood.  So close to so many things - the Art Institute, the Plaza, Westport, Downtown, a Starbucks 2 blocks away, the Nelson Atkins Museum.  It's even worth walking the neighborhood to see all the beautiful old homes!
Westport also has some shops, restaurants & antique stores.

I've scoured every antique store in the state to create an authentic mid-century space - focused on peace & comfort.  Enjoy high end bedding & towels.  You'll find a fully equipped kitchen to meet your cooking & entertaining needs. For ideas on restaurants, night life & KC attractions while you're in town, check out my GUIDEBOOK online - a printed copy is also available in the home.

Stonebridge Resort is located just 10 minutes from the Branson strip and 1 mile from Silver Dollar City.  The gated communities 3200 acres intertwines with the popular & beautiful LedgeStone Championship Golf Course.  The resort is home to 3 outdoor swimming pools, 3 playgrounds, tennis courts, walking trails, catch & release lake, basketball court, sand volleyball court and on-site restaurant.

As a guest, you are welcome to enjoy all the amenities the resort has to offer.  There is a fee to golf, of course.  Simply sign up for a tee-time at the pro-shop in the Club House.

The Ledgestone Grille, located at the clubhouse, has a good selection for breakfast, lunch & dinner at approachable prices.  Both indoor & patio dining available.  Head over on Wednesday evening (5-9pm) for Karaoke - you might be treated with some local entertainers coming over on their night off!  Fine Dining is offered on Friday nights.

There are 3 marinas within 10 miles of Stonebridge Resort:  Indian Point, Port of Kimberling & State Park Marina.

There isn't much public transportation in the Branson area, so you will want a car.  There is parking available at each of the amenities on the resort.

RESORT FEE:  StoneBridge Resort will collect a $5 per vehicle per night fee.  The resort will collect this payment from you AT CHECKIN.

The Resort does not allow Boat, RV, Jet Ski or Trailer parking.  Please check with the local marina for options.

	• Spring Exposition (April 10 - May 12, 2025): A brand-new festival at Silver Dollar City featuring new shows, flavors, and attractions. 
	• Bluegrass & BBQ (May 14 - 26, 2025): Enjoy performances by top bluegrass artists and savor mouthwatering barbecue at Silver Dollar City. 
	• Branson Elvis Festival (May 2 - 4, 2025): Celebrate the King of Rock 'n' Roll with tribute artists and special events at the Pepsi Legends Theater. 
	• Southern Gospel Picnic (August 21 - September 1, 2025): A gathering of renowned Southern gospel artists combined with delicious southern-style cuisine. 
	• Harvest Festival (September 12 - October 26, 2025): Featuring thousands of illuminated pumpkins, crafts, and live entertainment at Silver Dollar City.

details.neighborhood_description:
Stonebridge Resort is located just 10 minutes from the Branson strip and 1 mile from Silver Dollar City.  The gated communities 3200 acres intertwines with the popular & beautiful LedgeStone Championship Golf Course.  The resort is home to 3 outdoor swimming pools, 3 playgrounds, tennis courts, walking trails, catch & release lake, basketball court, sand volleyball court and on-site restaurant.

As a guest, you are welcome to enjoy all the amenities the resort has to offer.  There is a fee to golf, of course.  Simply sign up for a tee-time at the pro-shop in the Club House.

The Ledgestone Grille, located at the clubhouse, has a good selection for breakfast, lunch & dinner at approachable prices.  Both indoor & patio dining available.  Head over on Wednesday evening (5-9pm) for Karaoke - you might be treated with some local entertainers coming over on their night off!  Fine Dining is offered on Friday nights.

There are 3 marinas within 10 miles of Stonebridge Resort:  Indian Point, Port of Kimberling & State Park Marina.
details.getting_around: There isn't much public transportation in the Branson area, so you will want a car.  There is parking available at each of the amenities on the resort.

Bijou House is located in the heart of Kansas City in an urban neighborhood where you can expect an eclectic mix of people.  Please do not book if you do not feel comfortable in an urban environment.

One of my favorite things about Kansas City are its old glorious buildings - which is why I fell in love with this 1880 Victorian charmer.  This home has seen a lot in it's 100+ years - including it's latest renovation transforming the bathrooms & kitchen into luxury spaces.
  
There are 3 bedrooms, each with 1 bed:
Upstairs: 1 King, 1 Queen, Full Bath
Downstairs: 1 King, 1/2 Bath

A few games and a fun retro arcade are available for those rainy days when you want to stay home.  On lovely days, enjoy the cozy backyard oasis with a gas grill for cooking & a gas firepit for relaxing.

You have access to the entire property.  Fenced backyard helps create a cozy oasis for you to relax.

I am available should you need something!  Just reach out with any questions or should anything not meet your expectations!

Located in the HEART of Westport (Part of the original Westport settlement in the 1800s!)  Walkable to many restaurants, bars & shopping.  

This is an URBAN neighborhood with an eclectic variety of people.  If you are not open minded, this neighborhood may not be the right fit for your group.  Some guests with young children do not feel this neighborhood is a fit.

Street parking.  Uber/Lyft anywhere (30 min from MCI airport).  Walk to shops, restaurants & bars.  

Free Streetcar coming Spring 2025 (with access to UMKC, Plaza, Union Station, Downtown & Rivermarket)

FIRST TIME GUESTS:
We love new guests & want to ensure the best experience!  Guests without any reviews will be asked a few questions as well as asked for ID Verification through our system.  Local guests without great reviews are not allowed.  This space is specifically for visitors to Kansas City.

PLEASE NOTE:  Smoking or vaping of any kind is not allowed indoors.  Smoking outside is fine provided waste is properly disposed of.  

Street car will be finished in Summer 2025 to allow free access to the River market, Downtown & the Plaza by way of the public streetcar, just 3 blocks away!

Don't want to sound negative... and House Rules are necessary.
***Please read & agree to keep all HOUSE RULES before booking***

—Open invite gatherings are not allowed. Only guests that are listed on the reservation or have been approved by the host are allowed in the home or on the property. Violation of this rule will result in losing your entire security deposit.
—Only guests listed on the reservation are permitted to stay overnight. Unapproved guests are an automatic $25 per guest/per day.
—No pets allowed.
—No smoking or vaping inside the house under any circumstances (including marijuana).
—No illegal drugs or illegal activities on the property whatsoever.
—Be careful when eating or drinking on furniture or beds.
—Please respect the neighborhood by keeping all noise to a minimum.
—Please be mindful to wipe or remove your shoes if it's muddy or wet outside.
—With the exception of chairs, do not move or rearrange any furniture.
—We welcome families, but our home is not child-proof. If you're staying with small children, feel free to move any household items out of reach.
—Please use provided makeup wipes/towels to remove your makeup. $10 per towel will be charged for excessively soiled towels.
—Excessive soil will be subject to an extra charge. Example: sticky floors, dirty dishes, bodily fluids, confetti, etc....
—Please do not attach decorations to walls. You will be subject to a charge for damages to drywall.
—Do not place loose trash in outside trash bin.
—If there are any signs of illegal activities, smoking inside the home, a party or event without consent of host, or violation of any other house rules, you may lose your entire security deposit.
— We have a security camera at each entrance. They are always on and will be recording throughout your stay. The cameras do not record audio.

Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of midtown KC!  Plenty of off-street parking!

Historic Southmoreland neighborhood is ideally located walking distance to restaurants, grocery & shopping. For ideas on restaurants, night life & KC attractions while you're in town, I'll send you a map of my favorites!

NOTE:
2nd floor apartment accessible only by stairs. No LOCALS without GREAT reviews allowed.

One of my favorite things about Kansas City are its old glorious buildings - which is why I fell in love with this 1900 Victorian charmer.  This home has seen a lot in it's 100+ years, including being converted into 4 separate apartments. 

This Midtown getaway is a happy, refreshing and beautiful escape from the ordinary hotel.  Tall ceilings, fun touches and a clean palette create an inviting & refreshing space.  

This 1 bedroom apartment is on the 2nd floor - accessible only by an exterior stairwell.  You'll find a fully equipped kitchen to meet your cooking & entertaining needs.  Coffee, sugar & creamer are provided (or Starbucks is just 2 blocks away).  Access your own TV apps through the Roku Smart TV.   Fiber Internet available - the fastest in town. 

If you're here for work - there's a desk in the living room & a printer for your use.

Your apartment is in the rear of the building.  You'll take the back stairs up to the top where you'll meet your private patio & entrance to your apartment.  You'll be provided a code which activates at check-in time and deactivates just after check out.

Feel free to message me through the app.  I also live in the building so am often available if needed.

There is plenty of off-street parking in the side lot - able to accommodate a moving van and more than one car if you have it. This is a 2nd floor apartment, accessed by exterior stairwell on the side of the home.  

PETS:
Cats & Dogs that don't bark are welcome. I must be respectful of the neighbors so cannot have barkers.  Camp Bow-wow is a few blocks away if you have a dog that barks a lot.  There is a one-time pet fee.  Please include your pet on your reservation.
